reviews.review: Классика на все времена. как по мне, даже лучше чем 1.6, из-за синглплеера и обновленной графики с текстурами

Good game. I bought it just only for missions in game. Missions are really interesting and I mostly play them when i have nothing to do. However now autumn sale and for 0,81€ it's really worth every single cent. Buy it as fast as you can!
this game is old and good !

Still playing...One of my favourite addictive game...More fun with friends.

A suprisingly fun game, just recently installed it and have been enjoying myself.
